node.name: Fishbolt: Eclipse UI integration with the hibernate model
node.shortdescription:
The project gives ability to easily and quickly develop user interfaces for domain data models (including hibernate based model) using Eclipse UI components. The plug-in supports both simple SWT components like input fields, combo boxes, lists, etc. and complex JFace components like editors, wizards, tables, trees, etc.

In addition to the plug-in, Fishbolt offers some more Eclipse plug-ins (model and its integration with the plugin and etc) that form together a multi-tiered application framework based on the Eclipse platform. For more details refer to Eclipse platform integration.

See also an example at http://fishbolt.org/eclipse/org.fishbolt.model.hibernate.annotations/doc...

The new version is coming soon and it will be opened
node.body:
The project gives ability to easily and quickly develop user interfaces for domain data models (including hibernate based model) using Eclipse UI components. The plug-in supports both simple SWT components like input fields, combo boxes, lists, etc. and complex JFace components like editors, wizards, tables, trees, etc.

In addition to the plug-in, Fishbolt offers some more Eclipse plug-ins (model and its integration with the plugin and etc) that form together a multi-tiered application framework based on the Eclipse platform. For more details refer to Eclipse platform integration.

See also an example at http://fishbolt.org/eclipse/org.fishbolt.model.hibernate.annotations/doc...

The new version is coming soon and it will be opened
